skill.name: Debugging Assistant Skill
skill.description: Intelligent debugging workflow that systematically identifies symptoms, performs root cause analysis, generates fixes with explanations, validates solutions, and prevents regressions through comprehensive testing.
skill.summary: Intelligent debugging workflow that systematically identifies symptoms, performs root cause analysis...
skill.author: DNYoussef

security_audit.summary: This is a documentation and orchestration skill with a supporting bash script. The script coordinates Claude Flow hooks and memory system. No network exfiltration, credential theft, or malicious code patterns detected. Risk factors are limited to standard development tooling usage.

content.value_statement: Debugging complex issues wastes hours of developer time. This skill provides a structured 5-phase workflow with AI agents to identify symptoms, trace root causes, generate fixes, validate solutions, and prevent regressions automatically.
actual_capabilities: Systematically identifies symptoms from error messages and logs
Performs root cause analysis using execution tracing techniques
Generates multiple fix approaches with trade-off evaluations
Creates validation tests to confirm bug reproduction
Runs regression test suites to verify no side effects
Adds permanent tests and documentation to prevent recurrence
limitations: Cannot debug issues that cannot be reproduced with provided context
Complex distributed system issues may require manual intervention
Performance profiling requires separate profiling tools
Security vulnerabilities need specialized security review

use_cases.title: Fix Runtime Errors
use_cases.description: Debug TypeErrors, null pointer exceptions, and other runtime failures quickly

use_cases.title: Investigate Test Failures
use_cases.description: Analyze failing tests and identify root causes with reproducible test cases

use_cases.title: Debug Production Issues
use_cases.description: Trace production bugs using log analysis and structured debugging workflow

prompt_templates.title: Quick Start
prompt_templates.prompt: /debug-assist "Getting TypeError: Cannot read property of undefined at line 45 in users.js"

prompt_templates.title: With Context
prompt_templates.prompt: /debug-assist --file src/auth.js --log error.log "Login failing with undefined user error"

prompt_templates.title: Interactive
prompt_templates.prompt: /debug-assist --interactive "Debug intermittent race condition in cart checkout"

prompt_templates.title: Performance
prompt_templates.prompt: /debug-assist --profile "API response time degraded from 100ms to 2s after last deployment"

output_examples.input: /debug-assist "Users getting undefined error when logging in"
output: Root Cause: Missing await on async getUserById call
Fix: Added await keyword and null validation

best_practices: Provide full error messages, stack traces, and reproduction steps for faster diagnosis
Follow all 5 phases including validation and regression prevention
Create .debug-config.json to customize test and lint commands for your project
anti_patterns: Skipping validation testing and applying fixes without verifying test coverage
Not documenting the root cause and fix reasoning for future reference
Ignoring similar patterns elsewhere in the codebase that may have the same bug

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. It coordinates code-analyzer, coder, and tester agents.

faq.question: What types of issues can it debug?
faq.answer: It handles null errors, race conditions, memory leaks, async issues, type errors, logic errors, and performance problems.

faq.question: How does it integrate with CI/CD?
faq.answer: The skill can link to GitHub Issues, JIRA, and trigger GitHub Actions workflows for automated testing.

faq.question: Is my code data safe?
faq.answer: The skill only reads your code for analysis purposes. No code or data is sent to external servers beyond your AI tool.

faq.question: Why did the debugging fail?
faq.answer: Common reasons: insufficient reproduction steps, environment differences, or issues too complex for automated analysis. The skill will request more information.

faq.question: How is this different from manual debugging?
faq.answer: It provides a systematic 5-phase process, coordinates multiple AI agents, stores context in memory, and ensures fixes include permanent tests.
